articles.title: BCCI asks police to probe Dream 11 ‘link’ in fake T20 league - The Indian Express
articles.description: The ACU also asked the investigators to look into the role of FanCode, a streaming website that live broadcast the Uva T20 League shown as being held in Sri Lanka but actually played at a local club ground in Sawara village close to Mohali.
